name: Super Yakyuudou
overview: Super Yakyuudou is a baseball simulation game in the Yakyuudou series from Nihon (Nippon) Create. As with previous games in the series, there's a strong simulation element where players focus on building teams and managing athletes. The game was originally released on the PC-98 in 1992 and saw a graphically-updated Super Famicom port in 1996.
